text: 15 Orionis is a class F2IV (early F-type subgiant) star in the constellation Orion. Its apparent magnitude is 4.82 and it is approximately 540 light years away based on parallax. It is the southern pole star of Uranus. It has one suspected companion, B, at a separation of 0.3". Vizier catalog entry ==References== Category:Southern pole stars
title: 15 Orionis
